job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongA Software Development company is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a fulltime Direct Hire basis Youd be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives Youll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorshipbrbrAs a Site Reliability Engineer youll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problemsbrbrstronguRequired Skills amp ExperiencebrustrongulliAzure and AWSliliAzure DevOpsliliScripting in either Java or PowershellliliTerraform and ansibleliliKubernetesbrliulstronguDesired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongulli5 years of experience in an DevOps EnvironmentliliOracleliliSpringbootliliDockerbrliuluThe OfferbruulliCompetitive Salary Up to 155Kyear DOEbrliulstronguYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsbrustrongullihealth dental visionlili401kliliCasual and Flexible Work Culture and EnvironmentliliAbility to work in a Techdriven companybrliulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrstrongPosted Bystrong Connor Bowlesbrbr
